description: Admin who has privileges related to managing App functionalities / features and data for the organization.
A senior person, typically owner who has access to all of the functionality in this App (except some IT sensitive features e.g. data purging etc.).
A person who works for Business Owner and has privileges for a particular team / business unit / functionalities of this App.
A standard user with regular privileges to features and functionalities needed for day-to-day use.
